flawed_nl_solution:
He had B - 21 books after the history section.
He had B - 21 - 19 = B - {ERROR} books after the fiction section.
He had B - {ERROR} - 8 + 4 = B - 44 books after the children’s section.
He still had B - 44 = 16 books to shelve.
Thus, he started with B = 16 + 44 = <<16+44=60>>60 books in the cart.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
